attributes.action: Change law on domestic burglar alarms
attributes.additional_details: Change the law governing the use of domestic burglar alarms so that hard working people get a good night's sleep. Preferably ban them altogether as they serve no useful crime prevention purpose or at least restrict their volume and cut the permitted duration to a maximum of five minutes; ban the use of motion sensors that mean alarms can be set off if, for example, a window is left open. Do not allow them to be set off by a power interruption.
